name: Defend the Kingdom!
description:
Hey everybody!

This is my game submition for the GMTK game jam 2020! (https://itch.io/jam/gmtk-2020)

I worked solo on this one, so I had to use some pre-made assets.

Hope you guys like it.

And special thanks to Gustavo Franckeviciu for helping me with the idea and playtesting. 

Story

You are a prince who needs the defend his kingdom from enemies, but your brother keeps messing with you by buying crystals. Also some god is casting random spells all the time.

Survive this chaos and mantain control of your realm!

How to Play:

WASD = Move the camera

Mouse = Select and upgrade the towers

Esc = Menu

Objective: Destroy the enemy castle.
